turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you order me a white chocolate Mocha from Starbucks please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, from which one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on scottsville road in bowling green.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Tall please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what type of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whipped cream with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else for the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you get it with extra chocolate sauce on it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes we can do that. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would also like 3 shots of espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay got it. When would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need it ready in about 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, is that all for this order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, great we will get it ready.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order is ready at the bowling green starbucks and your receipt will be sent to your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay thank you.
